mn46:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn46:2.2_0: ‘aho vata aniṭṭhā akantā amanāpā dhammā parihāyeyyuṁ,
mn46:2.3_1: sattānaṁ evaṅkāmānaṁ evaṁchandānaṁ evaṁadhippāyānaṁ aniṭṭhā akantā amanāpā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
mn46:2.4_0: Tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, kaṁ hetuṁ paccethā”ti?
mn46:2.5_0: “Bhagavaṁmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā, bhagavaṁnettikā, bhagavaṁpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu vata, bhante,
mn46:2.6_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn46:2.7_1: bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
mn46:3.1_1: ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
mn46:3.1_2: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto,
mn46:3.2_0: sevitabbe dhamme na jānāti asevitabbe dhamme na jānāti,
mn46:3.2_1: bhajitabbe dhamme na jānāti abhajitabbe dhamme na jānāti.
mn46:3.3_0: So sevitabbe dhamme ajānanto asevitabbe dhamme ajānanto,
mn46:3.3_1: bhajitabbe dhamme ajānanto abhajitabbe dhamme ajānanto,
mn46:3.3_2: asevitabbe dhamme sevati sevitabbe dhamme na sevati,
mn46:3.3_3: abhajitabbe dhamme bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati.
mn46:3.4_0: Tassa asevitabbe dhamme sevato sevitabbe dhamme asevato,
mn46:3.4_1: abhajitabbe dhamme bhajato bhajitabbe dhamme abhajato aniṭṭhā akantā amanāpā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
mn46:3.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ aviddasuno.
mn46:4.1_1: ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto,
mn46:4.1_2: sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto,
mn46:4.2_0: sevitabbe dhamme jānāti asevitabbe dhamme jānāti,
mn46:4.2_1: bhajitabbe dhamme jānāti abhajitabbe dhamme jānāti.
mn46:4.3_0: So sevitabbe dhamme jānanto asevitabbe dhamme jānanto,
mn46:4.3_1: bhajitabbe dhamme jānanto abhajitabbe dhamme jānanto,
mn46:4.3_2: asevitabbe dhamme na sevati sevitabbe dhamme sevati,
mn46:4.3_3: abhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme bhajati.
mn46:4.4_0: Tassa asevitabbe dhamme asevato sevitabbe dhamme sevato,
mn46:4.4_1: abhajitabbe dhamme abhajato bhajitabbe dhamme bhajato,
mn46:4.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ viddasuno.
mn46:6.3_0: Taṁ avidvā avijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ appajānanto taṁ sevati, taṁ na parivajjeti.
mn46:6.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ aviddasuno.
mn46:7.1_1: yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhaṁ āyatiṁ dukkhavipākaṁ taṁ avidvā avijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti:
mn46:7.3_0: Taṁ avidvā avijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ appajānanto taṁ sevati, taṁ na parivajjeti.
mn46:7.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ aviddasuno.
mn46:8.3_0: Taṁ avidvā avijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ appajānanto taṁ na sevati, taṁ parivajjeti.
mn46:8.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ aviddasuno.
mn46:9.3_0: Taṁ avidvā avijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ appajānanto taṁ na sevati, taṁ parivajjeti.
mn46:9.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ aviddasuno.
mn46:10.1_1: yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhañceva āyatiñca dukkhavipākaṁ taṁ vidvā vijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti:
mn46:10.3_0: Taṁ vidvā vijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ pajānanto taṁ na sevati, taṁ parivajjeti.
mn46:10.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ viddasuno.
mn46:11.1_1: yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhaṁ āyatiṁ dukkhavipākaṁ taṁ vidvā vijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti:
mn46:11.3_0: Taṁ vidvā vijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ pajānanto taṁ na sevati, taṁ parivajjeti.
mn46:11.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ viddasuno.
mn46:12.1_1: yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhaṁ āyatiṁ sukhavipākaṁ taṁ vidvā vijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti:
mn46:12.3_0: Taṁ vidvā vijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ pajānanto taṁ sevati, taṁ na parivajjeti.
mn46:12.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ viddasuno.
mn46:13.1_1: yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhañceva āyatiñca sukhavipākaṁ taṁ vidvā vijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti:
mn46:13.3_0: Taṁ vidvā vijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ pajānanto taṁ sevati, taṁ na parivajjeti.
mn46:13.6_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ viddasuno.
mn46:14.2_1: ekacco sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena pāṇātipātī hoti,
mn46:14.3_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena adinnādāyī hoti,
mn46:14.4_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena kāmesu micchācārī hoti,
mn46:14.4_1: kāmesu micchācārapaccayā ca dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
mn46:14.5_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena musāvādī hoti,
mn46:14.6_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena pisuṇavāco hoti,
mn46:14.7_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena pharusavāco hoti,
mn46:14.8_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena samphappalāpī hoti,
mn46:14.9_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena abhijjhālu hoti,
mn46:14.10_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena byāpannacitto hoti,
mn46:14.11_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena micchādiṭṭhi hoti,
mn46:14.12_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
mn46:15.2_1: ekacco sahāpi sukhena sahāpi somanassena pāṇātipātī hoti,
mn46:15.3_0: sahāpi sukhena sahāpi somanassena adinnādāyī hoti,
mn46:15.4_0: sahāpi sukhena sahāpi somanassena kāmesumicchācārī hoti,
mn46:15.5_0: sahāpi sukhena sahāpi somanassena musāvādī hoti,

mn46:15.12_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
mn46:16.2_1: ekacco sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti,
mn46:16.2_2: pāṇātipātā veramaṇīpaccayā ca dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
mn46:16.3_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti,
mn46:16.3_1: adinnādānā veramaṇīpaccayā ca dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
mn46:16.4_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti,
mn46:16.4_1: kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇīpaccayā ca dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
mn46:16.5_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena musāvādā paṭivirato hoti,
mn46:16.5_1: musāvādā veramaṇīpaccayā ca dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
mn46:16.6_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti,
mn46:16.6_1: pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇīpaccayā ca dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
mn46:16.7_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti,
mn46:16.7_1: pharusāya vācāya veramaṇīpaccayā ca dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
mn46:16.8_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti,
mn46:16.8_1: samphappalāpā veramaṇīpaccayā ca dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
mn46:16.9_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena anabhijjhālu hoti,
mn46:16.10_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena abyāpannacitto hoti,
mn46:16.11_0: sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena sammādiṭṭhi hoti,
mn46:16.12_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.

mn46:18.2_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
mn46:18.6_0: Tassa te pivato ceva nacchādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi,
mn46:18.6_1: pivitvā ca pana maraṇaṁ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’ti.
mn46:18.8_0: Tassa taṁ pivato ceva nacchādeyya vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi,
mn46:18.8_1: pivitvā ca pana maraṇaṁ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
mn46:19.3_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
mn46:19.8_0: Tassa te pivatohi kho chādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi,
mn46:19.8_1: pivitvā ca pana maraṇaṁ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’ti.
mn46:19.10_0: Tassa taṁ pivatohi kho chādeyya vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi,
mn46:19.10_1: pivitvā ca pana maraṇaṁ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
mn46:20.4_1: idaṁ pūtimuttaṁ nānābhesajjehi saṁsaṭṭhaṁ, sace ākaṅkhasi piva.
mn46:20.5_0: Tassa te pivatohi kho nacchādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi,
mn46:20.7_0: Tassa taṁ pivatohi kho nacchādeyya vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana sukhī assa.
mn46:21.1_1: dadhi ca madhu ca sappi ca phāṇitañca ekajjhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ.
mn46:21.4_1: idaṁ dadhi ca madhu ca sappi ca phāṇitañca ekajjhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ, sace ākaṅkhasi piva.
mn46:21.5_0: Tassa te pivato ceva chādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi,
mn46:21.7_0: Tassa taṁ pivato ceva chādeyya vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana sukhī assa.
mn46:22.1_1: vassānaṁ pacchime māse saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalāhake deve ādicco nabhaṁ abbhussakkamāno sabbaṁ ākāsagataṁ tamagataṁ abhivihacca bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate ca;
mn46:22.2_1: yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhañceva āyatiñca sukhavipākaṁ tadaññe puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇaparappavāde abhivihacca bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate cā”ti.
mn46:22.4_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
